contents.text: Thank you for calling Autodesk in North Bay, where we help you imagine, design, and make a better world.
For new sales inquiries, licensing and pricing information, or product demonstrations, press 1.
For licensing and pricing information, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our licensing and pricing team.

navigationGoals: Get a detailed quote and setup options for adding five new AutoCAD seats to my existing license.
I want pricing details and to check if I qualify for a veteran discount on Autodesk software
Get a detailed breakdown of subscription licensing tiers and pricing for Autodesk’s product suite.
I need help understanding the cost to renew or upgrade my software license.
I need information on student licensing and pricing for Autodesk software for my physics projects.

contents.text: To schedule a product demonstration, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a product demonstration specialist.

navigationGoals: Arrange a concise, live walkthrough of the latest Inventor features for my engineering team.
I’d like to schedule a demo of Fusion 360 to evaluate it for designing prosthetic parts
Schedule a live demo of Autodesk Revit’s generative design and parametric modeling features.
I’d like to schedule a demonstration of the product so I can see how it works.
I’d like to schedule a demo of Fusion 360 to see how it can support my lab equipment design.

contents.text: For technical support or training resources, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Resolve a recurring installation error I’m encountering with Revit on my desktop.
I need help troubleshooting an error that’s preventing AutoCAD from launching on my computer
Troubleshoot a C# .NET plug-in loading error in AutoCAD 2022 on Windows 10.
I’m having trouble with the software and need technical support to fix it.
I’m having trouble installing AutoCAD and need technical support to resolve it.

contents.text: For training and learning resources, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our training and learning resources team.

navigationGoals: Locate and enroll in a fast-track online training course for Fusion 360 basics.
I want to access beginner-level AutoCAD training modules to support my transition to a civilian engineering role
Access advanced Dynamo scripting tutorials for automating Revit design workflows.
I want to find and sign up for beginner-friendly training materials or classes.
I’m looking for training materials or tutorials on Autodesk Inventor for my coursework.
